summary:
────────────────────────────────
**Summary**
• X rolled out XChat, their end-to-end encrypted messaging shit.
• It’s got some sketchy vibes, like how they handle keys and data.
• Basically, it’s a beta test disguised as a finished product, so chill.

Impact — Don’t trust XChat with your deepest secrets just yet, let them iron out the kinks first.

────────────────────────────────
Link: https://techcrunch.com/2025/09/05/x-is-now-offering-me-end-to-end-encrypted-chat-you-probably-shouldnt-trust-it-yet/
